ðŸ“– Summary: Prophet is a tool designed for producing high-quality forecasts for time series data. It utilizes an additive model to fit non-linear trends with multiple seasonality, including yearly, weekly, and daily patterns, as well as holiday effects. The tool is robust to missing data, shifts in trends, and outliers, making it suitable for time series with strong seasonal effects and historical data.
